page.title: 05PENSIONER 8O+ WITH WIFE (2)
page.content: Locally, he sees the important issues as firstly, the preservation of the important conservation areas and historic buildings, secondly the preservation of open spaces and lastly the preservation of a high standard of education. In the future he hopes personally to continue living an interesting life and not stagnate and to see Portchester keep a friendly atmosphere. During his lifetime he sees our greatest loss to be that of self-sufficiency through the introduction of government schemes which have caused a feeling of complacency and dependency on others.
